attributes.action: None of the above in Elections
attributes.additional_details:
There should be a "None of the Above" choice in all election ballot papers.

There are people who feel increasingly disconnected with the democratic process. I suggest the following changes.

1/ Everyone should have to exercise their vote in some way

2/ There is a "None of the Above" on all ballots.

This would serve......

- to accurately reflect voter apathy and demonstrate just how little of the country is required to vote in a Government under the current system.

- to make  parties on all sides work harder to secure the "None of the Above" voters.
